game.name: Captain America Doctor
game.description:
Your favorite superhero is just back with some cool missions. We are talking about a most popular superhero named Captain America who has an immense popularity worldwide. However, today is not his day as he got injured while fighting with one of the bad souls. Like many of his previous battles, he has witnessed the victory once again. But, this battle has left him with a big injury. Join Captain America Doctor and be prepared to provide him with the needful treatment!
He is a brave warrior, but this injury has hurt him badly. So, your responsibility is to treat him as fast as possible to help get back to his work. Avoid wasting your time anymore and start checking out the details of this brand new doctor game for girls! Shine his chest star and heal all the injuries he got on various parts of his body, including mouth, arms, thighs and knees! Use the syringe to soak all the unwanted blood and other equipment to make him and armor shine again!
There are five steps to complete in this html5 surgical game for kids. We hope that you follow all the steps as instructed by the gameplay and will help superhero to get to his normal life again. Browse through our wide array of doctor games to meet with your other favorite superheroes! We continue updating our website, so you are rest assured of meeting the new online games and having fun, no download required.
